structured_notes_xml:
<structured_notes>
    <project_name>Complete Test - Task Management App</project_name>
    <company_overview>Not specified</company_overview>
    <attendees>
        <attendee>
            <name>Product Manager</name>
            <role>Product Manager</role>
        </attendee>
        <attendee>
            <name>Tech Lead</name>
            <role>Tech Lead</role>
        </attendee>
        <attendee>
            <name>UX Designer</name>
            <role>UX Designer</role>
        </attendee>
    </attendees>
    <meeting_date>November 1, 2025</meeting_date>
    <meeting_objective>Main purpose/goal of the meeting: Building a simple task management application</meeting_objective>
    <key_discussion_points>
        <point>User registration and login</point>
        <point>Create, view, and manage tasks</point>
        <point>Mark tasks as complete</point>
        <point>Simple dashboard to see all tasks</point>
        <point>User authentication (email/password)</point>
        <point>Task CRUD operations</point>
        <point>Dashboard with statistics</point>
        <point>Filtering and sorting</point>
    </key_discussion_points>
    <pain_points>
        <pain_point>Not specified</pain_point>
    </pain_points>
    <requirements>
        <requirement>User registration and login</requirement>
        <requirement>Create, view, and manage tasks</requirement>
        <requirement>Mark tasks as complete</requirement>
        <requirement>Simple dashboard to see all tasks</requirement>
        <requirement>User authentication (email/password)</requirement>
        <requirement>Task CRUD operations</requirement>
        <requirement>Dashboard with statistics</requirement>
        <requirement>Filtering and sorting</requirement>
    </requirements>
    <decisions_made>
        <decision>Aim to have the application ready in 4 weeks</decision>
    </decisions_made>
    <action_items>
        <action_item>UX Designer to start working on mockups</action_item>
        <action_item>Tech Lead to draft technical architecture and API specifications</action_item>
    </action_items>
    <technical_constraints>
        <constraint>Modern web application with React frontend, Node.js backend, and MongoDB database</constraint>
    </technical_constraints>
    <stakeholders>
        <stakeholder>Product Manager, Tech Lead, UX Designer</stakeholder>
    </stakeholders>
</structured_notes>
